publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2352 Malcolm Chisholm: Charities and Trustee Investment (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Charities and Trustee Investment (Scotland) Bill. Supported by: Johann Lamont*
